subtitle: zida suggested to the other anunaki
artificial Peaks can be erected on it so
on a tablet he drew the image of smooth
Peaks rising to the sky if this can be
done let it be enlil approved let them
also serve as
beacons above the plane over the river
valley ningishzida built a model he
perfected the ascending angles and the
four smooth sides next to it he placed a
larger Peak its sides oriented to the
four corners of the Earth the anunaki
cut and erected stones with their
powerful tools beside the first peak in
a precise location they raised its Twin
Peak they carefully designed Galleries
and Chambers for pulsating crystals when
this enormous Peak Rose to the heavens
the leaders were invited to place the
Capstone on it Gibble prepared a mixture
of electrum from which the Apex Stone
was made the sunlight reflected to the
